channel.title: CVE Feed for Linux -- Linux kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Linux -- Linux kernel

item.title: CVE-2024-24859|2024-07-05T17:21:25.429Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in sniff_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in a bluetooth sniffing exception issue, possibly leading denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-24858|2024-07-05T17:21:10.209Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in {conn,adv}_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in I2cap connection or broadcast abnormality issue, possibly leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-23196|2024-07-05T17:22:53.499Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's sound/hda device driver in snd_hdac_regmap_sync() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24855|2024-07-05T17:21:34.582Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's scsi device driver in lpfc_unregister_fcf_rescan() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24860|2024-07-05T17:21:19.546Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's bluetooth device driver in {min,max}_key_size_set() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24864|2024-07-05T17:21:24.554Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/dvb-core in dvbdmx_write() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24857|2024-02-05T07:31:31.308Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth device driver in conn_info_{min,max}_age_set() function. This can result in integrity overflow issue, possibly leading to bluetooth connection abnormality or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-22386|2024-02-05T07:21:20.819Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's drm/exynos device driver in exynos_drm_crtc_atomic_disable() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-22099|2024-01-25T07:02:59.928Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description:
NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernel on Linux, x86, ARM (net, bluetooth modules) allows Overflow Buffers. This vulnerability is associated with program files /net/bluetooth/rfcomm/core.C.
This issue affects Linux kernel: v2.6.12-rc2.

item.title: CVE-2024-23307|2024-01-25T06:59:37.190Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernel on Linux, x86, ARM (md, raid, raid5 modules) allows Forced Integer Overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-23196|2024-02-05T07:22:39.907Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's sound/hda device driver in snd_hdac_regmap_sync() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24861|2024-06-04T17:43:39.200Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/xc4000 device driver in xc4000 xc4000_get_frequency() function. This can result in return value overflow issue, possibly leading to malfunction or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24857|2024-06-04T17:43:34.885Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth device driver in conn_info_{min,max}_age_set() function. This can result in integrity overflow issue, possibly leading to bluetooth connection abnormality or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-24860|2024-02-05T07:27:31.042Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's bluetooth device driver in {min,max}_key_size_set() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24864|2024-02-05T07:36:04.281Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/dvb-core in dvbdmx_write() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24859|2024-02-05T07:28:06.115Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in sniff_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in a bluetooth sniffing exception issue, possibly leading denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-24855|2024-02-05T07:25:41.568Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's scsi device driver in lpfc_unregister_fcf_rescan() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-24858|2024-02-05T07:30:55.483Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in {conn,adv}_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in I2cap connection or broadcast abnormality issue, possibly leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-21803|2024-01-30T07:15:33.276Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description:
Use After Free vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernel on Linux, x86, ARM (bluetooth modules) allows Local Execution of Code. This vulnerability is associated with program files https://gitee.Com/anolis/cloud-kernel/blob/devel-5.10/net/bluetooth/af_bluetooth.C.
This issue affects Linux kernel: from v2.6.12-rc2 before v6.8-rc1.

item.title: CVE-2024-24861|2024-02-05T07:26:43.824Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/xc4000 device driver in xc4000 xc4000_get_frequency() function. This can result in return value overflow issue, possibly leading to malfunction or denial of service issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-22386|2024-06-28T17:07:05.173Z -- linux -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's drm/exynos device driver in exynos_drm_crtc_atomic_disable() function. This can result in a null pointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.
